attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: what have you done to our health care.no beds no staff no money my mam got to the opp room waited one hour to find out every body was putting thair coats on to go home.they had to find some one to push her back to ward.2 more  cancelled this is for cancer.we need to put more money more beds more staff.i did not know it was so bad. hazel

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
